Australia just passed a law that forces drone manufactures to hard code a unique ID on the circuitry and on the parts of a drone.  The drone when purchased must be licensed with the Austrailian government along with the Unique ID of the drone.  People who fly drones must be licensed to fly drones. All drones must respond with their Unique ID when scanned by the civil Avation Authority.
